title: Applications
content:
An application is an investment of an IT company that implements a business process or function in your organization. An application can be made up of one or more actual services and supports a portfolio or portfolios and has its business value defined.

The following identifies an application:

  • An application's business value has been uniquely defined and if possible, aligned with business priorities.
  • An application uniquely supports a process or a set of processes (data domains).
  • An application requires tracking operational effort at the level the application is managed.
  • An application's codes are managed as standalone.

The following are a few examples of applications:

  • eShopping
  • Security auditor
  • Comm center
  • Contract manager

Each application has one or more roadmaps defined. Each roadmap has multiple phases and milestones which can be viewed in a timeline.
